byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Gen Pershing withdraws authorization for use of his name; dinner canceled
snippet: WASHINGTON, April 2--General John. J. Pershing, in a formal statement issued today through the War Department, said that the Women World War Veterans, Inc., of New York had been using his name in an unauthorized manner....

headline.main: PERSHING BARS GROUP FROM USA OF NAME; Withdraws Authorization Given to Women Veterans Here

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 2--General John. J. Pershing, in a formal statement issued today through the War Department, said that the Women World War Veterans, Inc., of New York had been using his name in an unauthorized manner.
